mapper.select: SELECT I.*,R.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT INFO_IDX, TO_CHAR(INFO_INS_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS INFO_INS_DT ,INFO_CATEGORY,INFO_STATE,INFO_TITLE,INFO_MEM_ID,INFO_FILE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY INFO_IDX DESC) INUM FROM T_INFORM_TABLE WHERE INFO_STATE=1 ) WHERE INUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2 )I, ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT RS_IDX, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RS_REGDATE,PRICE AS RS_PRICE,FILENAME AS RS_FILENAME,SUBJECT AS RS_SUBJECT, MEM_ID AS RS_MEM_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RS_IDX DESC) RNUM FROM T_RESALE_BOARD ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2 )R WHERE INUM=RNUM
